conversations.title: System of Equations — Frontend Review & Backend Alignment
conversations.summary: Reviewed existing System of Equations lesson (5 levels). Fixed 3 frontend issues and 2 backend misconfigurations.
changes: Fixed hardcoded colors in EqChip (#3B82F6/#EF4444) and HintBox (#f6ad55) to use theme tokens — dark mode compliance
Restructured SystemBox layout: brace now on left side with equations stacked vertically (standard math notation)
Fixed Level 4 substitution explanation to properly format negative coefficients (was showing '+ -10y', now shows '− 10y')
Updated backend config from 1 level to 5 levels with component names
Updated getLessonDataInitial.js: replaced single BasicProblemsWordsOnly with all 5 SystemOfEquations components and level-specific hints

conversations.title: System of Equations — Migrate to Backend Data Generation
conversations.summary: Migrated System of Equations from pure frontend generation to backend data generation, following the PythagoreanTheorem pattern. All 5 level generators moved to backend, frontend refactored to consume data via useLessonState/Redux.
changes: Created backend generator: services/lessonProcessors/questions/systemOfEquationsGenerator.js — 5 level generators + helpers, returns standardized shape with visualData, acceptedAnswers, hint, explanation
Registered generator in lessonProcessors/index.js — added to getQuestionGenerator() chain and hasCustomGenerator() check
Updated backend config: skipSteps [3,5,6,7,8,9,10,11], customDataGeneration enabled for all 5 levels with batchSize 10

Refactored frontend: removed ~280 lines of client-side generation, switched to useLessonState() hook, reads from questionAnswerArray/lessonProps, uses visualData for rendering, answerType='array' with acceptedAnswers for all levels

conversations.title: Rounding — New 4-Level Lesson with Backend Data Generation
conversations.summary: Created new 4-level Rounding lesson from scratch with backend data generation. Level 1: whole number rounding (ones/tens/hundreds/thousands), Level 2: decimal rounding (ones/tenths/hundredths/thousandths), Level 3: mixed + extended place values, Level 4: word problems (money/distance/population/science/temperature).
changes: Created backend generator: roundingGenerator.js — 4 level generators with roundToPlace helper, formatNumber, getBounds, buildAcceptedAnswers, 5 word problem templates
Created backend config: rounding.config.js — skipSteps [3,5,6,7,8,9,10,11], customDataGeneration enabled for all 4 levels with batchSize 10
Registered generator in lessonProcessors/index.js and config in lessonConfigs/index.js
Created frontend component: Rounding.jsx — single component for all 4 levels, useLessonState hook, CSS number line visualization, theme-aware styled components, answerType='array'
Updated DataLesson.js: lazy-loaded Rounding component for 4 levels
Updated algebra/index.js exports and getLessonDataInitial.js component names

conversations.title: Order of Operations — New 4-Level Interactive Lesson
conversations.summary: Created new 4-level Order of Operations lesson with interactive PEMDAS mechanic. L1-3: students click operators in correct PEMDAS order, expression simplifies step by step. L4: type the final answer. Backend generates token-based expressions with pre-computed evaluation steps.
changes: Created backend generator: orderOfOperationsGenerator.js — PEMDAS engine (computeSteps, findInnermostParenGroup, findHighestPriorityOp, collapseTokens, removeRedundantParens), 4 level generators with guards (clean division, capped exponents, non-negative intermediates, mixed priorities)
Created backend config: order_of_operations.config.js — skipSteps [3,5,6,7,8,9,10,11], customDataGeneration enabled for all 4 levels with batchSize 10
Registered generator in lessonProcessors/index.js and config in lessonConfigs/index.js

Created frontend component: OrderOfOperations.jsx — interactive click-to-evaluate for L1-3 (token display, operator buttons, shake/collapse animations, step log), KaTeX + AnswerInput for L4, theme-aware styled components
Updated DataLesson.js: lazy-loaded OrderOfOperations component for 4 levels (replaced Evaluating)
Updated algebra/index.js exports and getLessonDataInitial.js component names

description: Active conversations less than 7 days old
